meaning_str.bing:
n. 背景；底色；幕后；经历
网络. 后台；背景色；背景颜色

背景；（事情的）背景情况；出身；经历；背景音乐；环境；后台；幕后；后景；隐退状态（计算机程序的非活跃运行状态）；基础知识；素养；文化底蕴；次要地位
作为背景；作…的背景；在背后支持；使处于次要位置；使处于不显眼位置

1.en: Mr Romney, no doubt sensitised by his background in private equity, wants green cards "stapled" to advanced science degrees.
1.cn: 罗姆尼希望为每一位拥有高学历的科研人才“配发”绿卡，他的这种睿智无疑来自于在私人股本领域工作的经历。

2.en: But, sadly, I am taken for granted by those who use me, as if I were a mere incident and without background.
2.cn: 不过，悲惨的是，那些使用我的人想当然的猜测我的所有秘密，就好像我仅仅只是一个毫无背景的附属品。

3.en: If I knew nothing about his background and saw him for the first time, I would not assume he is racially mixed.
3.cn: 如果我对他的背景不了解的话，我肯定不会认为说他是混血。

0.en: They're just doing a background check on me.
0.cn: 他们只是为了调查一下我的背景而已。

1.cn: 里面有我们的化名、背景、一切信息。

2.en: Physicists have mapped this cosmic microwave background across the universe.
2.cn: 物理学家已经绘制出了穿越宇宙的这种宇宙微波背景。

3.en: My priors? What are you talking about? Background, Bob. I am talking about your background.
3.cn: 我的过往？你在说什么？你的背景，鲍勃，我在说你的背景。

4.en: Your background? In high school, I was a runner for a gang.
4.cn: 你背景？高中时，我是黑帮毒贩。

5.en: She wears the costume. Gunfire in the background. A hint of smoke. Our Mockingjay.
5.cn: 让她穿上制服，用战场作为背景，再来点烟雾，这就是我们的嘲笑鸟。

6.en: Joey, all the roles got to dance a little. But believe me with your dance background it'll be a piece of cake.
6.cn: 所有的角色都要跳一点舞，但以你的舞蹈背景，小意思罢了。

7.en: No one else knows you're Internal Affairs? Howard's the only one who knew about me and my background.
7.cn: 没别人知道你是内务部的人吗？霍华德是唯一知道我和我背景的人。

8.en: He plays for the Yankees. Seriously, ESPN. Just once and a while, have it on in the background.
8.cn: 他是洋基棒球队的球员，真的，多看ESPN，有时候，开着它当背景也好。

9.en: This gun was illegally obtained by a career criminal at a gun show where background checks aren't mandatory.
9.cn: 这把枪是一个职业罪犯非法地在一个不强制背景审查的枪展上购得的。

10.en: Well, I could ask my dad. Maybe he can get some of his old cop buddies to do a background check on her.
10.cn: 我可以让我爸查查她。或许他可以让他以前的警察朋友对她做一个背景调查。

11.en: I say we choose someone with a marketing background to help us sell what's never been sold.
11.cn: 我的意思是我们选一个有市场营销背景的人，让他来帮助我们把营销业绩提高到前所未有的水平

12.en: He saw my juvie record and knew I had the perfect background for the next time someone tried to infiltrate the academy.
12.cn: 他看到了我的青少年犯罪记录，知道我有绝佳背景可以替他们潜伏进警校。

13.en: This one was ordered on the Internet. No background checks. This gun killed Bob and Sue Grant's 14 year old son.
13.cn: 这把是在网上购得，完全没有背景审查。这把枪打死了鲍勃和苏·格兰特14岁的儿子。

14.en: His work in black body form and anisotropy of the cosmic microwave background radiation cemented our understanding of the origin of the universe.
14.cn: 他对黑体和宇宙微波背景辐射的各向异性的研究跟宇宙起源的观点有许多相通之处。

15.en: And even though gun safety legislation to strengthen background checks has been voted down in congress at the time they were doing this interview.
15.cn: 然而，就在他们接受采访的同时，加强背景调查的枪支安全法遭到了国会的投票否决。

16.en: I did a comprehensive background check. Medical records, credit reports, criminal history. I trust you paid off those parking tickets.
16.cn: 我对你的背景做了全面的调查，医疗记录，信用记录，犯罪史等等，我相信你已经缴清了那些停车罚单了吧。

17.en: His pediatrician happens to have a background in clinical genetics and he has no idea what's going on, but he says, "Let's get this kid's genome sequenced."
17.cn: 他的儿科医生恰好有临床遗传学方面的背景，他不知道问题出在哪儿，他说“让我们给他做基因组测序吧”。

18.en: For eight years, the team's telescopes scanned a patch in the sky measuring manual differences in the temperature of the cosmic microwave background and a pattern emerged.
18.cn: 八年以来，团队的望远镜扫描了天空的一片，测量了宇宙微波背景和出现的形状，在温度上的微小差异。

19.en: I mean, they're highly-trained educators with background checks. They're even required to be current on all vaccinations. You leave her with me, and I'm not any of those things.
19.cn: 他们都是通过背景调查，训练有素的教育工作者。甚至要求身上所有疫苗皆要在有效期内你也让我照顾她啊，可刚才说的我一样都没有。
